EmailTemplate.description: Notify Approver 3 of request for payment requiring his/her approval
EmailTemplate.name: 20Notify Approver 3 of request for payment requiring his/her approval
EmailTemplate.subject: DTW Alert: Your Deliver to Win baseline margin target has changed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
A Deliver to Win Payment Request has been submitted which requires your approval. The following exceptions have been requested:
Insert list of exceptions requiring third level approval
Please click the link below to review and approve or reject this request.
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.Name}
Thank you,
DTW Administrator
{!EnrollmentPlan__c.ReplyTo__c}
